com.swipr.models

Class Buyer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swipr.models.User
      • com.swipr.models.Buyer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SellQueryListener

    @Entity
public class Buyer
extends User
implements SellQueryListener
    Buyer class that represents the provided user information from Google, and their venmo account. This information is stored in our PostgreSQL database. Buyers are able to search for existing offers.

      • searchOffer

        public boolean searchOffer(long start,
                           long end)
        Searches for an offer that matches the user's specifications
        Parameters:
        start - the start time of the request
        end - the end time of the request
        Returns:
        whether an offer was successfully found

      • onMatchFound

        public void onMatchFound(SellQuery sellQuery,
                         boolean update)
        When the matchmaker finds a matching SellQuery for this Buyer, add the SellQuery to the list of matched sell queries.
        Specified by:
        onMatchFound in interface SellQueryListener
        Parameters:
        sellQuery - the sellquery to add to the list of matched sellqueries for this buyer
        update - indicate whether or not a new offer was found for a particular buyer

      • onMatchCancelled

        public void onMatchCancelled(SellQuery expiredSellQuery)
        When a SellQuery gets cancelled, Matchmaker calls this function to remove the SellQuery from the list.
        Specified by:
        onMatchCancelled in interface SellQueryListener
        Parameters:
        expiredSellQuery - the sellQuery to remove from the list

      • clearMatchedSellQueries

        public void clearMatchedSellQueries()
        Clear the list of matched sell queries. Needed in case the user changes their buy query.

      • getMatchedSellQueries

        public ArrayList<SellQuery> getMatchedSellQueries()
        Get a list of matched offers
        Returns:
        a list of matched offers for a particular buyer

      • indicateInterestInOffer

        public void indicateInterestInOffer(SellQuery sellQuery,
                                    Seller seller,
                                    long meetTime,
                                    long preferredDiningHall)
        Call this when the human buyer presses the "I'm interested" button for the given SellQuery. If the given SellQuery is still active and associated with a Seller, add this Buyer to the said Seller's list of potential buyers.
        Parameters:
        sellQuery - the sellquery to indicate interest in
        seller - the seller that holds a particular sellquery
        meetTime - the preferred meet time of a particular buyer
        preferredDiningHall - the preferred dining hall of a particular buyer

      • cancelInterestInOffer

        public void cancelInterestInOffer(SellQuery sellQuery,
                                  Seller seller)
        Called when a user wants to cancel their interest in a particular offer
        Parameters:
        sellQuery - the offer that they would like to cancel interest in
        seller - the seller that holds the particular offer
